name: PopUp Blockers - Block Web Browser Simulator 2k16
name_original: PopUp Blockers - Block Web Browser Simulator 2k16
description:
Think you are fast enough in using technology? The meter continues to rise... How long can you stop the onslaught... Stop the viruses here and now!

Pop Up Blockers is the latest craze to hit the block!

* No ADS
* Game runs on all iPhones, iPod Touches and iPads running 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
* Small file size
* Early access sale price


No crippled gameplay, No data requirements. No micro transactions. No IAP. Just game.
